long_description: Add the TravelChair Paddler Chair to your canoe and enjoy ventilated, adjustable comfort. Plus, you can remove the chair and use the seat on the beach. Super comfy with ergonomic S-bend back rest and adjustable lumbar for optimal comfort and support. Aluminum and rustproof frame with stainless-steel hardware make for a long-lasting chair for wet environments. Breathable, water draining mesh fabric means a quick dry time. PVC-free and high recycled content. TravelChair Paddler Chair weighs only 2 lbs. 5 oz.
short_description: Add the TravelChair Paddler Chair to your canoe and enjoy ventilated, adjustable comfort. Plus, you can remove the chair and use the seat on the beach.
